definitions.definition: a single thing or a separate part of something larger:
examples: Each unit of the text book focuses on a different grammar point.

definitions.definition: a piece of furniture or equipment that is intended to be fitted as a part of a set of similar or matching pieces:
a small machine or part of a machine that has a particular purpose:
examples: the central processing unit of a computer

definitions.definition: a single complete product of the type that a business sells
a single apartment in a bigger building:
examples: The old house has been divided up into three rental units.
